title: Gourmet Getaways: A Taste of North America's Top Resorts
description: This beautifully illustrated book is part cookbook, part vacation guide that captures the flavors of the most appealing resorts on the continent. It takes you on a culinary tour of 78 distinctive resorts sprinkled throughout Canada, the U.S., the Caribbean, & Mexico. Many of the carefully selected recipes are accompanied by notes from their creators -- chefs ranging from rising stars in the gourmet world to established culinary geniuses. Irresistible appetizers, soups, main courses, & desserts you'll be able to prepare in your own kitchen. The only book of its kind -- a must for gourmets, armchair chefs, & travel enthusiasts.
author: Paris Permenter
